scripts.patch DATE: npm version patch && npm run update-manifest && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor MONTH: npm version minor && npm run update-manifest && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major YEAR: npm version major && npm run update-manifest && git push --follow-tags
scripts.update-manifest: npm run sync-manifest-version && git add public/manifest.json && git commit -m "chore: sync manifest version"
